projects.title: DietVision — AI Nutrition Assistant
projects.name: DietVision
projects.description: AI-powered nutrition assistant that analyzes meal images, classifies food using a CNN, and recommends healthier alternatives. Includes a Gemini-powered chatbot for interactive nutrition support.

projects.title: Facial Emotion Detection — Real-Time Expression Classifier
projects.name: Facial Emotion Detection
projects.description: A real-time facial emotion recognition system that uses a CNN to classify emotions such as happiness, anger, sadness, surprise, and neutrality from live webcam input or images. Built for interactive AI applications and human–computer interaction.

projects.title: Sceneify3D — AI 3D Reconstruction
projects.name: Sceneify3D
projects.description: Turns 2D images or short videos into 3D digital twins using photogrammetry and deep learning. Designed for e-commerce digital assets and architectural visualization.

projects.title: MammoGuard — Interpretable Breast Cancer Detection
projects.name: MammoGuard
projects.description: Safety-aware breast cancer detection pipeline including lesion detection, bounding-box localization, CNN classification, and interpretability (Grad-CAM + occlusion).
